name: Microcare Network
tag_list: mobile, testing, performance, qa, monitoring, apm, saas, applications, developers
overview:
Microcare Network Inc. is a provider of SaaS based, performance monitoring and compatibility testing solutions for mobile applications.

Microcare enables companies and individual app developers to overcome fragmentation and continuously improve user experience, with its two main services:

• Testin - Cross platform automated compatibility testing, performed remotely on multiple real devices. • QTestin - Real time performance monitoring of mobile content, applications and services, across a global network of devices and live networks.

Microcare’s innovative approach combines efficiency, ease and cost effectiveness, with high quality testing & monitoring in real world conditions. Microcare’s infrastructure includes over 300 real devices hosted on its cloud platform, and a global network of monitoring devices connected to live mobile networks in different locations.
